channel.title: GDACS RSS information
channel.description: Near real-time alerts about natural disaster with a potential humanitarian impact

item.title: Green alert for tropical cyclone CALVINIA-19. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0.
item.description: From 29/12/2019 to 29/12/2019, a Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 93 km/h) CALVINIA-19 was active in SWIndian. The cyclone affects these countries: Mauritius (vulnerability Medium). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0.
item.dc:subject: TC1
item.gdacs:severity: Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 93 km/h)
item.gdacs:population: Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.5M, Depth:10km) in South Africa 28/12/2019 15:36 UTC, No people within 100km.
item.description: On 12/28/2019 3:36:35 PM, an earthquake occurred in South Africa potentially affecting No people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.5M, Depth:10km.
item.dc:subject: EQ1

item.title: Green alert for tropical cyclone SARAI-19. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0.
item.description: From 26/12/2019 to 29/12/2019, a Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 130 km/h) SARAI-19 was active in SEPacific. The cyclone affects these countries: Fiji, Tonga, Niue (vulnerability Medium). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0.
item.dc:subject: TC1
item.gdacs:severity: Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 111 km/h)
item.gdacs:population: Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 9677

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.5M, Depth:59.95km) in Southeast Of Loyalty Islands 26/12/2019 02:21 UTC, No people within 100km.
item.description: On 12/26/2019 2:21:35 AM, an earthquake occurred in Southeast Of Loyalty Islands potentially affecting No people within 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.5M, Depth:59.95km.

item.title: Orange alert for tropical cyclone PHANFONE-19. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0.795 million.
item.description: From 21/12/2019 to 28/12/2019, a Tropical Depression (maximum wind speed of 176 km/h) PHANFONE-19 was active in NWPacific. The cyclone affects these countries: Philippines (vulnerability Medium). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0.795 million.
item.dc:subject: TC1
item.gdacs:severity: Tropical Depression (maximum wind speed of 46 km/h)
item.gdacs:population: Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 4.477 million
